articles.author: By Monica Greep For Mailonline
articles.title: Woman who quit job in high fashion spends six days a week sewing homemade face masks - Daily Mail
articles.description: Amanda Riley, from west London, who quit her job in high fashion is now spending six days a week sewing homemade face masks and has made at least 300 so far, she told The Telegraph.
articles.content:
A woman who quit her job in high fashion has revealed she is now spending six days a week sewing homemade face masks - and has made at least 300 so far.  
Amanda Riley, from west London, set up a business teaching beginners how to sew after rejecting a top j… [+3327 chars]

articles.title: Boss of tiny UK firm ‘extremely optimistic’ his one-a-day pill will combat coronavirus - The Sun
articles.content:
